Folders

create_new_folder
Click the icon create_new_folder to select a folder to sort.

You can decide how to sort your folders by categories/subfolders, you can also turn on automation so that when a new file is added to the folder, it will be sorted with your defined rules

Categories/Subfolders

add
Categories are subfolders that will hold your organized files. You can create as many categories as you want.

File extensions

add
Here you decide which files go into your category by extensions, extensions are what you find after the dot in your file names, IE. *.doc, *.png, there is no need to include the dot.
